setting.name: tag_unconfirmed
setting.title: Tag for Unconfirmed Petition Signers
setting.help_text: If set, new contacts that are created when signing a petition are assigned a tag of this name.

setting.name: petition_contacts
setting.title: Petition Signers Group
setting.help_text: If set, new contacts that are created when signing a petition are assigned a tag of this name.
